channel.title: Nullpointerexception?
channel.description: I;ve been getting this error every once in a while and besides massers, its the last major crash on my server, so as you can probly imagine I could really use your help. This is what I get: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:153) at client.createGroundItem(client.java:15374) at ItemHandler.spawnItem(ItemHandler.java:103) at ItemHandler.addItem(ItemHandler.java:94) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:935) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:747) at server.main(server.java:67)[/code] After that happens, everyone gets disconnected and the server thinks you are still online, so you can't log in, at leaste until the next server restart. I hate to admit, but I have not noticed anything in game that actually causes this error. Anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Nullpointerexception?
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

I;ve been getting this error every once in a while and besides massers, its the last major crash on my server, so as you can probly imagine I could really use your help. This is what I get:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:153) at client.createGroundItem(client.java:15374) at ItemHandler.spawnItem(ItemHandler.java:103) at ItemHandler.addItem(ItemHandler.java:94) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:935) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:747) at server.main(server.java:67)
After that happens, everyone gets disconnected and the server thinks you are still online, so you can’t log in, at leaste until the next server restart. I hate to admit, but I have not noticed anything in game that actually causes this error. Anyone know how to fix this?

Read full topic
